mapper.select: select sound.*, artist.artist_name from sound sound join album album on sound.a_no=album.a_no join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where album.a_no=#{a_no}
select s_path from sound where s_no=#{s_no} and a_no=#{a_no}
